import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete a specific order"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/devices/{deviceId}/orders/{orderId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a single order identified by its ID for a given device.
This operation is irreversible and will permanently remove the order.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Device ID","in":"path","name":"deviceId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Order ID","in":"path","name":"orderId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Order deleted successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"created_at":{"type":"string"},"deleted_at":{"type":"string"},"device_id":{"type":"string"},"group":{"enum":["COMMAND","CONFIG"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["COMMAND","CONFIG"]},"id":{"type":"integer"},"metadata":{"type":"string"},"parameters":{"items":{"properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"module":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"sourced_created_at":{"type":"string"},"status":{"enum":["DELETED","PROCESSED","FAILED","SENT","PENDING"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["DELETED","PROCESSED","FAILED","SENT","PENDING"]},"type":{"enum":["ADD_WIFI","DELETE_WIFI","DEVICE_STATE","REQUEST_IMAGE","REQUEST_VIDEO","CONFIG","REBOOT","DRIVER_COACH_INERTIAL","DRIVER_COACH_TELEMETRY","DRIVER_COACH_TRACKING","INTERNAL"],"type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["ADD_WIFI","DELETE_WIFI","DEVICE_STATE","REQUEST_IMAGE","REQUEST_VIDEO","ORDER_CONFIG","REBOOT","DRIVER_COACH_INERTIAL","DRIVER_COACH_TELEMETRY","DRIVER_COACH_TRACKING","INTERNAL"]},"ulid":{"type":"string"},"updated_at":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{}}}}}}
>
